alert.note: Alert for Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 7:48PM CST until February 18 at 10:48AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... North Fork Obion River near Martin For the Obion River...including Martin, Obion, Bogota...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Obion River near Martin. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding is occurring along the North Fork Obion River in northeast Obion County and northwest Weakley County. Flooding is also occurring in low-lying areas near Union City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 20.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.1 feet on 05/18/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
